03Baguette: ^<color=#ffffffff>You approach your pet. A perfect, 28 inch long, golden brown Baguette.
^Baguette's googly eyes stare in a multitude of directions.
^Where it's focus truly is, a mystery, but welcomed.
PetBaguette: ^<color=#ffffffff>You lower your hand to your pet's crust, a soft crumble
^It's long body is firm under the added pressure.
^Baguette's eyes, ever the curious things they are, wiggle to the new movement.
^You take your hand away from your only companion, satisfied.
LeaveBaguette: ^<color=#ffffffff>Staring down at the companion, you decide not to give it affection.
^There will always be other days and times.
